title: Qing Shui Lian Hua - The Lotus on the Water
description: 清水荷花, at 白云寺街5号, is a vegan food Chinese restaurant near Wenshu temple. Has English picture menu presented on an ipad by the waitress. Typical Chinese veg style options and mock meats with dishes ranging from 20 yuan to 100+ yuan. Clean and simple inside, in a nice historic area of Chengdu.
